OH, I found the language registry entry.
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE>Software>Wow6432Node>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted>Locale

Change it to en_EN
Registry key is in: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWOW6432NODEEA GamesNeed for Speed(TM) Most Wanted

Aliright then, for the people with the language problem; the language can ONLY be chosen in the installer, THERE IS NO IN-GAME LANGUAGE OPTION (and you can't change anything in the registery to switch the language either, the Jimmy5461 person up there is just another internet douche), because the installer ONLY installs the language and video files that you have chosen, either Russian or English. 

So for those who have already installed, you're going to have to uninstall and then reinstall with the right choice. The first choice the game asks you to make is the language one; chose the second option for English (it'll create an "EN-US" folder in your install directory instead of the default "RUS" one).

But here's the big fucking problem, the English game DOESN't fucking work (at least not on Win 7 64). GRRRRRR I had to fucking install/uninstall 3 times just to get the language thing right, and now this... (BTW, the Russian one seems to work fine though.)

PS: Well at least the download was super fast.

Update:

Alright, finally made it to work (win7 64/GTX 570):

a) Run installer, choose second option in first choice.

b) Find HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE>Software>Wow6432Node>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted>Locale
in your windows registery and change the value to en-EN (thanks tester124 and Frosticee for the info)

c) Download, and copy/paste this crack "Need for Speed Most Wanted Crack Only v2.0 3DM NiCkkkDoN" (5.5MB only, and it is available here on TPB.)

And FINALLY you're good to go, Jesus Christ this was irritating.

OMG. Thanks to whateverthefuck, tester124 and Frosticee. Finally got this game to English.

When you're in the installer select Àíãëèéñêèé. IT MEANS ENGLISH.

Then go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE>Software>Wow6432Node>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted>Locale

Change ru_RU to en_EN

for those stuck at loading screen or having problem in changing language to English:

a) Run installer, choose second option in first choice.

b) Find HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE>Software>Wow6432Node>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted
in your windows registery and change the value of Locale to en-EN
and 
GDFBinary to GDFBinary_en_US.dll
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE>Software>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted
in your windows registery and change the value of Locale to en-EN
and GDFBinary to GDFBinary_en_US.dll

c) apply the crack(use 3dm crack).

in your windows registery and change the value of Locale to en-EN
and
GDFBinary to GDFBinary_en_US.dll

in your windows registery and change the value of Locale to en-EN

Everything explained!!
a) Run installer, choose second option something like- Aeeiioouioee (Russian).

b) After completing installation.Open registry editor and find HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE>Software>Wow6432Node>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted>Locale
in your windows registry and change the value to en-EN.

c) And change GDFBinary to x:xxxxxNeed for Speed(TM) Most WantedGDFBinary_en_US.dll *(where x= your computer drive and folder name in which the game is installed)

d) Remember you will have to change both values in Software>Wow6432Node>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted as well as Software>EA Games>Need for Speed(TM) Most Wanted.

e) Installing this shit is a pain in the @55..

f) Have fun..
